translated: Elder’s Birth Stories🔽The Chapter with Nāḷāgiri
The Elder Pānadhidāya’s Birth Story
“The Blessed One Anomadassī,
the world’s chief, bull among men,
having come out from his dwelling,
the one with vision ascended the path.
Taking a well-made drink,
I set out on the road;
there I saw the Fully Enlightened One,
the one with beautiful appearance, ascending the path.
Having gladdened my own mind,🔽and having taken out the drink,
having placed it at his feet,🔽I spoke this statement:
‘Ascend, Great Hero,
Sugata, Leader!
From here I will receive the fruit,
may that purpose of mine be fulfilled!’
The Blessed One Anomadassī,
the world’s chief, bull among men,
having ascended the drink,

analyzed: idam vacanam abravi  yaḥ pānadhim me adāsi
translated: spoke this statement:🔽‘He who, with faith in his own hands,
gave me this drink,
I will praise him;
listen to my words.’
Having understood the Buddha’s words,

analyzed: sabbe devā samāgatā  udagga cittā sumanā
translated: all the gods assembled;🔽with uplifted minds, joyful,
having become aware, with palms together,
‘By the gift of this drink,
will be happy.
Fifty-five times

analyzed: deva rajjam karissati  sahassakkhattum rājā ca  cakkavattī bhavissati
translated: he will be king of the gods.🔽A thousand times he will be a king🔽who rules the earth,
and many times a king of a small district,
incalculable in number.
After an immeasurable aeon

analyzed: okkāka kula sambhavaḥ  gotamaḥ nāma gottena
translated: he will be born in the Okkāka family,🔽and will be a teacher in the world
known as Gotama by clan.
He will be an heir to the Dhamma,
a disciple born from his breast,
and having fully understood all the corruptions,
he will be extinguished, without corruption.
He will be reborn in the world of the gods or among humans,
and will be endowed with merit.
He will obtain a vehicle
that is the equal of the divine vehicle.’
Palaces, couches, and mansions,🔽elephants in full adornment,
chariots yoked with thoroughbreds
will always appear to me.
Even when I left the house
I left in a chariot.
When my hair was being cut,

analyzed: arahattam apāpuṇi  lābhāḥ su laddham me
translated: I attained perfection.🔽I have gained, I have gained well,
my trading has been well invested.
Having given a single pānaka drink,
I have attained the unshakable state.
For countless eons from now,
the drink I gave as a gift,
I do not know of any bad destination,
this is the result of giving a drink.
My defilements are destroyed,
I live without defilements.
Welcome indeed it was for me,
the Buddha’s instruction has been fulfilled.
The four analytical insights,

original: kataṁ buddhassa sāsanaṁ”.🔽Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā pānadhidāyako thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
analyzed: katam buddhassa sāsana  ittham sudam āyasmā pānadhidāyakaḥ theraḥ imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsittha ati
translated: the Buddha’s instruction has been fulfilled.”🔽Thus the elder Pānadhidāyaka recited these verses.
The Story of the Elder Pānadhidāyaka is the ninth.
